Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got such a magic charm that people forget to see that.
But there’s one thing I have to say: DISCRETE MEDIA SUCKS!

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy sharecropper Gas (Edward Asner) has not enough to feed everybody at his small farmstead. His six brilliant children (Spann Toledo, Kathleen Nettles, MaLee Krumbiegel, Jon Cassar. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film.
